title: Demi Vollering is stronger than she was at this time last year, and that’s put her mind in the right place
content:
The SD Worx rider says she can make better tactical decisions now that she's not at the limit physically.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering is stronger than she was at this time last year, and that’s put her mind in the right place on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
